fast-food.message: Fast-food tends to spike sodium + added sugar. Consider a lighter next meal.

fried.message: Fried foods add calories fast. Balance with lean protein + fiber next.

soda.message: Soda usually blows past added sugar. Swap to zero-sugar or water.

salad.message: Great. Keep fiber coming—aim to add protein to stay full.

high-protein.message: Solid protein choice. Watch sodium if it’s processed meat.

notes: Kidney-friendly suggestions are general and not medical advice.
Targets vary a lot by labs/doctor instructions.

win: You're on track today. Don’t get cute—finish strong with a simple, clean next meal.
This is what winning looks like: consistent, boring, repeatable. Keep it going.
nudge: Small fix: tighten one thing (sodium or sugar) and your day improves fast.
You don’t need perfect—you need better choices *on purpose*.
warning: Today is drifting. That’s fine—reset with your next meal, not tomorrow.
Your numbers are trying to tell you something. Listen and adjust now.
